name: Shrugs with Barbells
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with your hands shoulder-width apart.
2. Keep your core engaged and hold the barbell with a neutral grip, avoiding any twisting in your wrists.
3. Shrug your shoulders up towards your ears by keeping your elbows straight and squeezing your upper traps to lift the weight off the ground.
4. Push your shoulders up as far as possible without leaning forward or rounding your back.
5. Hold the contraction for 1-2 seconds, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
6. Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Shrugs with barbells target the muscles in your upper back and shoulders.
